labels.label:
Invokes the Access
token generation API
by passing the
username & password
coming from the
upstream flowfile
as body for the API call.

Replaces flowfile
content with sample
text containing
extracted flowfile
attributes.

Creates an flowfile
attribute called
access_token with
extracted access token
as its value.
Invoke Nifi System diagnostics API and extract Heap, Content, Flow, Provenance utilization details from the response.

SSL context controller
service Requires
Truststore filepath & password
as the API is HTTPS

Invokes Nifi System
diagnostics API with
access token passed
as Bearer token for
the API call. Values
passed as dynamic
properties is taken
as headers for API call
by InvokeHttp

Adds flowfile as
file to the specified
directory location.

Generates flowfile with
content as username
and password which
is passed as data to
POST call

SSL context controller
service Requires
Truststore filepath & password
as the API is HTTPS

Extracts the required
fields from JSON
response and creates
corresponding flowfile
attributes.
